mapper.update:
UPDATE professor SET PRFS_NM = #{prfs_nm}, PRFS_ENG_NM = #{prfs_eng_nm}, PRFS_BIR =#{prfs_bir}, PRFS_EMAIL =#{prfs_email}, PRFS_PW =#{prfs_pw}, PRFS_REGNO =#{prfs_regno}, PRFS_GEN =#{prfs_gen}, PRFS_PIC =#{prfs_pic}, PRFS_ACT_NUM =#{prfs_act_num}, PRFS_BANK =#{prfs_bank}, PRFS_AH =#{prfs_ah}, PRFS_ADDR=#{prfs_addr}, PRFS_ZIP=#{prfs_zip}, PRFS_TEL=#{prfs_tel}, PRFS_HP=#{prfs_hp}, PRFS_DEPT=#{prfs_dept}
where PRFS_NUM = #{prfs_num};
mapper.select: SELECT PRFS_NUM, PRFS_NM, PRFS_ENG_NM, PRFS_BIR, PRFS_EMAIL, PRFS_PW, PRFS_REGNO, PRFS_GEN, PRFS_PIC, PRFS_ACT_NUM, PRFS_BANK, PRFS_AH, PRFS_ADDR, PRFS_ZIP, PRFS_TEL, PRFS_HP, ( SELECT DEPT_NM FROM DEPARTMENT where DEPT_NUM = PRFS_DEPT )AS prfs_dept, ENABLED, AUTHORITY FROM PROFESSOR P
